mapper.select:
SELECT ID as id, FIRST_NAME as firstName, LAST_NAME as lastName, EMAIL as email, CONCAT(FIRST_NAME, ' ', LAST_NAME) as fullName, USER_ROLE as userRole, ENABLED as enabled, PROFESSION as profession, ORGANISATION_NAME as orgName, if(ENABLED = 1, "Yes","No") as enabledString, CREATED_BY as createdBy, CREATED_DATE as createdDate FROM tbl_users
WHERE ID=#{id}

SELECT ID as id, FIRST_NAME as firstName, LAST_NAME as lastName, EMAIL as email, PASSWORD as password, CONCAT(FIRST_NAME, ' ', LAST_NAME) as fullName, USER_ROLE as userRole, ENABLED as enabled, PROFESSION as profession, ORGANISATION_NAME as orgName, CREATED_BY as createdBy, CREATED_IP as createdIp, CREATED_DATE as createdDate, LAST_MODIFIED_BY as lastModifiedBy, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE as lastModifiedDate, LAST_MODIFIED_IP as lastModifiedIp FROM tbl_users WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
